mapper.select: select * from ( select reg_date,cust_code,verify_code from T_INF_CLNREGLOG) where rownum=1

select * from( select to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date,cust_code,verify_code from T_INF_CLNREGLOG where cust_code=#{name} and stat='S0A' and verify_code>'0' order by reg_date desc ) where rownum<=3

select * from( select to_char(VERIGENTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date,STAFFCODE cust_code,VERIFYCODE verify_code from t_inf_loginlog where STAFFCODE=#{name} and VERIFYCODE>'0' order by VERIGENTIME desc ) where rownum<=3
